message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe we can come to an agreement. Let me propose a price of $15,000 for the product.
Hello Alice, thanks for the offer but $15,000 is too high for my budget. I'm interested in the product, but I could only consider a price closer to $8,000.
Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your budget constraints and am willing to negotiate. I would like to counteroffer at $10,000 for the product.
